item.title: Hugo and Google Cloud Storage
item.description: I’m using Hugo as a static site generator for this blog. I’m using Firebase (for free) to host lefsilver. I have other domains that I want to promote and decided to use Google Cloud Storage buckets for these sites. Using Google Cloud Storage for Hosting a static website and using Hugo to deploy sites to Google Cloud Storage (GCS) are documented but, I didn’t find a location where this is combined into a single tutorial and I wanted to add an explanation for ensuring your sites are included in Google’s and Bing’s search indexes.
